data.persona: I am a patron of the arts. I donate time and money to local painters and sculptors. I am flighty and rash in decision-making.
data.description:
You are in the Tower.
This outside tower is made from big stones. It is grey with wood trim. There is one glass window that is used as a lookout tower.
There's a castle, an a spear, a cannon, a wood trim, a lookout tower, a stones, and a sword of the guards here.
The guard is here.

You are carrying a jewelry, a jewel, and a coin, wearing a shoes and a cleaning cloth, and wielding a sword on the wall.

data.short_motivation: I must be introduced to the King's artist
data.mid_motivation: I would like to share my wealth with the King's artist
data.long_motivation: I have heard wonderful tales of the King's artist and would like to commission the artist to make me a mural

timeline.label: 1 hour ago
timeline.action: get jewelry, jewel, coin and sword
